msbt.message: Hey, . Do ya know about Reactions? I can teach ya how to show Joy when you're real happy!See? When you let go, and let your happy come out, then everybody can feel your Joy along with you!Hit î‚§ whenever you wanna use Reactions! It's real fun!

Have you been using Reactions? I'm gonna teach ya a real good one today!Has anyone said, "You don't have as many crumbs on you today!" but you're too bashful to say, "Thanks!"?No worries! Just do this<10_4 /> <10_4 />See? You can tell I'm real flattered even though I haven't said anything!So now if you need to, just use Bashfulness and everyone will understand how you feel!

? Do you ever just feel like crying?Sure ya do! Everybody feels sad sometimesWhen you feel like you need to cry? Don't hold back! Use your Reactions! Justlikethis! Look! I'm so sad!If ya need to turn on the waterworks, and who doesn't sometimes, use Sorrow and let it all out!

I wanted to show you more Reactions today, but I can't remember which one it wasA huh huh huh. It was that one!<10_4 /> If ya forget something, use Mistaken, just likethat!Sometimes it's fun to do it just 'cause Where does that star EVEN COME FROM?<10_4 /> A huh huh huh.
Say, Can you tell how shy I feel right now?A huh huh huh, sometimes if you're feeling shy, Shyness can show it. I meanif ya want it toa huh huh

! How's it going? I'm gonna show you one of the real super-special Reactions today. OK?This one's for when you wanna brag, or when something cool happens. Like meeting a new bug!Ready? Ahem!<10_4 /> "I met a new bug!"Now when you wanna brag, you can use the Pride Reaction!
